INSERT INTO PROD_DEPEND_PLM ( ID, PROD_NO, DEPEND_NO, DEPEND_SRC, DEPEND_NAME, NORMS, PARAM, MODEL_DESC, DEP_NUMBER, UNIT, FAC_ADDR, FACTORY, MATERIAL, LEVEL, ALLOW_NO, PATENT_NO, SELL_NO, VERSION_NO, QUALTY_TIME, LOSE_DATE, PROD_STATUS, CUR_AMOUNT, FACTORY_ID, REMARK, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dependNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dependSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dependName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{norms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unit,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{facAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{material,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualtyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{prodStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{curAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PROD_DEPEND_PLM.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:

PROD_NO = #{prodNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPEND_NO = #{dependNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PATENT_NO = #{patentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_NO = #{sellNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALTY_TIME = #{qualtyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOSE_DATE = #{loseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PROD_STATUS = #{prodStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUR_AMOUNT = #{curAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FACTORY_ID = #{factoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
